pullRequest.title: Better Java file wizards with extension and implementation panels
pullRequest.bodyText:
A more advanced wizard for creating Java classes that let the user to
specify interfaces and superclasses right in the wizard.

nodes.bodyText: This is a change of API and should be documented as such (increment module version, enhance arch.xml, note in apichanges.xml).

commit.message:
Better Java class wizard

A more advanced wizard for creating Java classes that let the user to
specify interfaces and superclasses right in the wizard

Java file wizards with extension and implementation panels

This PR provides the ability to select the superclass and interfaces 
in all relevant wizards from the Java category.
